interestingFact: Japan has the highest number of vending machines per capita.
Brazil is the world's largest exporter of coffee.
Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world combined.
The ancient Egyptians invented a 365-day calendar.
Australia is the only continent that is also a country.
India has the world's largest postal network.
France has the most time zones of any country in the world, due to its overseas territories.
Mexico City is built on the ruins of the ancient Aztec city of Tenochtitlan.
